0.title: Assistant District Attorneys; revise number of.
0.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-31-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide Additional Legal Assistants To District Attorneys In Certain Circuit Court Districts; And For Related Purposes.

1.title: District attorneys FY 15 appropriation; delete certain restrictions on expenditure of funds in.
1.description: An Act To Amend Section 8 Of House Bill No. 1472, 2014 Regular Session, To Delete Certain Restrictions On The Expenditure Of Funds Appropriated From The State General Fund For The Purpose Of Paying Salaries And Travel Expenses Of District Attorneys And Assistant District Attorneys And Paying Office Expenses Of District Attorneys For The Fiscal Year 2015; And For Related Purposes.

2.title: Appropriation; Transportation, Department of - State Aid Road Construction, Office of.
2.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Office Of State Aid Road Construction Of The Mississippi Department Of Transportation For Fiscal Year 2015.

3.title: Appropriation; Transportation, Department of.
3.description: An Act Making An Appropriation From Special Funds In The State Treasury For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi Department Of Transportation, For The Fiscal Year 2015; And For Related Purposes.
